maze.logic

Class MazeGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • maze.logic.MazeGenerator

  • public class MazeGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    MazeGenerator.java-Class responsible for generate a random labirinth according to the size and number of dragons given.
    Author:
    Jose
